title: Archer (Ardougne)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Archers are found in Ardougne, atop Ardougne Castle. They are not aggressive to players, but when attacked, will defend themselves with Ranged attacks that are fairly accurate and can hit up to 5.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Archer (Ardougne)
This article is about the monsters guarding Ardougne Castle. For other examples of archers, see Archer.

Monster ID3301

Archers are found in Ardougne, atop Ardougne Castle. They are not aggressive to players, but when attacked, will defend themselves with Ranged attacks that are fairly accurate and can hit up to 5.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
29 March 2004
(update)

The NPC was permanently added with the launch of RuneScape 2.

2 February 2004
(update)

The NPC was released ingame to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

1 December 2003
(update)

The NPC was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta cache.
